data.text:
Very good accommodation in Bur Dubai. The roms are specious with facilities of service apartment. You will find conduction plate with utensils apart from refrigerator and iron. You will find toiletries and dental kit but don't forget to bring shaving kit with you as they don't provide it. 
The breakfast was very good but you have to go early in the restaurant if the hotel is fully booked as the capacity of restaurant does not match with the size of hotel.
data.title: Nice rooms with good breakfast

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear abhay60, 

Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience at Golden Sands Apartments and highlighting what you enjoyed the most, as well as areas where we can do better. 

Your feedback is greatly appreciated. We will make sure to share your accolades with the team, particularly bell staff, for their excellent service. 

We look forward to welcoming you once more at your home in the Emirates. 

All the best,
Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Golden Sands  Hotels

data.text:
Ideal place with complete satisfaction for family. 
The buffet was great. All expected amenities were present in the given apartment. We never called the reception for any issue. Our go to go apartment hotel in Dubai. The place is also close to the metro station and old Dubai.
data.title: Golden sands - smart vibes

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear franksnote,

We are truly delighted to receive your wonderful review of Golden Sands Hotel Apartments. Knowing you had an excellent stay is a pleasure to read. It is very encouraging for us when our (Guest Name) takes the time to express thankfulness for our efforts, rest assured that your kind words of praise will be shared with the team. 

We are looking forward to welcoming you back here at Golden Sands Hotel Apartments, your home in the Emirates.

All the best,
Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Golden Sands  Hotels

data.text:
Golden Sands Hotel Apartments 5 - Very clean room and everyday cleaning including towels and toiletries. Beds is very comfortable and wide. Very handy: Washing machine in the room! A good location only 15 minute walk from the metro but also supporting staff will find you taxi ride in a minute.
Breakfast enough choices, and replenished all the time.
Also good services where we were able to borrow swimming pool towels to use on the beach! Only thing I would mention is that the walls are thin and you can hear a lot from outside in the corridors. This was an issue with other guests allowing their children to run around during the early morning which made sleeping past 7:30-8am every morning an issue. I’m sure this doesn’t happen all the time otherwise we have nothing to fault during our stay.
data.title: Good value for money, Recommendation!!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:

Thank you for your kind words and for sharing your positive experience with us at the Golden Sands Hotel Apartments! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel. 

Your feedback is truly appreciated, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another exceptional stay in the future.

Sincerely,
Front Office Manager

data.text: never recommended anyone , see my google review , they charged us for TV broken , but TV was fine , it was very bas experience and learn something new when you check in or check out every time please check everything with their person to make sure all appliance running good , otherwise they charged you as Golden sand apartment charged us 1000 AED for TV , hotel is very bad on experience , room service very poor, I am not able to give them 1 start even , don't book and never try to stay on Golden sand any apartments
data.title: Very bad experience in my life as to stay in Golden Sand hotel apartment

data.text:
Avoid at all costs, Pathetic hotel and they don’t know anything about hospitality at all ways
Overall not recommended at all as it is far from the city Centre. 
My experience at this hotel was incredibly disappointing. Despite booking for two nights, I couldn't bear to stay even one night. 
Coming from a far, I had hoped for a relaxing vacation, but instead, my stay was marred by numerous disappointments.
Very rude staff at the reception.
Marcelin, the worst ever.
Gallab, at the reception acting as he is the general manager or he is the hotel owner I don’t know.
Parel, don’t know anything about customer service from near or far very rude and soooooo much ego.
data.title: Avoid at all costs, Pathetic hotel
